channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tree on Timbercroft Lane, 26th August
item.description:
Someone dumped a piece of tree on Timbercroft Lane. It's next to the pub Who'd A Thought It 7 Timbercroft Ln, London SE18 2SB by Flora Mews signage. Please remove asap. It's the second consecutive week of flytipping...

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, The Slade, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road floods in heavy rain, 26th August
item.description:

item.title: English left on traffic pole, near migrant center, 26th August
item.description:
Multiple flags left on traffic light and light posts, including multiple Union jack flags and a St George's Cross flag. This is near a migrants hotel to deliberately intimidate the people inside.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Cray Avenue, Poverest, Orpington, London
